DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identification of care-related activity that occurred at the time or following a patient seizure.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A disorder characterized by a sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A disorder characterized by a sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A disorder characterized by a sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin.

Property.preferredDefinition: The state of being active; any specific activity.

Concepts.definition: An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

Concepts.definition: A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

PermissibleValues.value: Patient saw a doctor at time of event

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The section of a hospital or clinic staffed and equipped to provide immediate medical treatment.: A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.

Concepts.definition: The section of a hospital staffed and equipped to provide immediate medical treatment.
A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.
